setting_profile.era: Ming Dynasty (명나라 / 明) Style (Generic Wuxia Setting).
role_in_story: The Unseen Power: Usually ignored due to 'Gwan-mu-bul-ga-chim' (Non-interference policy).
The Ultimate Threat: If the Murim goes too far, the Imperial Army (muskets/cannons) or Secret Police (Jinyiwei/Dongchang) intervene.
The Employer: Hires Murim masters as bodyguards or assassins.

royal_family.emperor: Hwang-je (皇帝) - The Son of Heaven.
royal_family.princes: Chin-wang (Imperial Prince / 親王) -> Gun-wang (County King / 郡王).

top_advisors.sam_gong: Sam-gong (Three Dukes / Taisa, Taibo, Taifu) - Rank 1.
top_advisors.nae_gak: Grand Secretariat (Dae-hak-sa / 大學士) - Emperor's advisors.

six_ministries.name: Yuk-bu (Six Ministries / 六部)
list: Byeong-bu (War / 兵部) - Handles military affairs.
Hyeong-bu (Justice / 刑部) - Handles law and police.

secret_police_and_antagonists.note: The most common government antagonists in Wuxia.

jinyiwei.name: 금의위 (Embroidered Uniform Guard / 錦衣衛)
jinyiwei.martial_arts: Often depicted as learning top-tier arts to counter Murim masters.
jinyiwei.visual: Golden/Red uniforms, embroidered flying fish patterns.

dongchang.name: 동창 (Eastern Depot / 東廠)
dongchang.role: Spy agency run by Eunuchs (Hwan-gwan / 宦官).
dongchang.reputation: More feared and ruthless than Jinyiwei. Rivals/Supervisors to Jinyiwei.
dongchang.skills: Eunuch martial arts (often yin-based, cruel, e.g., Sunflower Manual reference).

provincial.military: Do-ji-hwi-sa (Commander / 都指揮使) - Controls provincial army.

local.hyeon: Ji-hyeon (Magistrate / 知縣) - Rank 7. The most common official protagonists meet.
police: Po-gwae (Constable / 捕快) - The 'cops' of the Wuxia world.

narrative_usage: Protagonist helps a 'Ji-hyeon' (Magistrate) solve a case involving a demonic cult.
The 'Dongchang' eunuchs try to control the Murim Alliance, serving as the main villains.
A 'Golden Pillow' (Gold Medal) from the Emperor grants immunity from the law.
